ISGylation of the influenza A virus (IAV) NS1 protein inhibits its binding to importin-, blocking NS1 nuclear import (17), while ISGylation of the influenza B virus (IBV) NP protein inhibits its oligomerization, inhibiting the formation of the viral ribonucleoprotein complex (18).
